def show_bounding_boxes(image_bytes, box_sets, colors): """ Draws bounding boxes on an image and shows it with the default image viewer.
:param image_bytes: The image to draw, as bytes. :param box_sets: A list of lists of bounding boxes to draw on the image. :param colors: A list of colors to use to draw the bounding boxes. """ image = Image.open(io.BytesIO(image_bytes)) draw = ImageDraw.Draw(image) for boxes, color in zip(box_sets, colors): for box in boxes: left = image.width * box['Left'] top = image.height * box['Top'] right = (image.width * box['Width']) + left bottom = (image.height * box['Height']) + top draw.rectangle([left, top, right, bottom], outline=color, width=3) image.show()
